TopicTitle: how do i find my game files?

Articles.Content: i was looking through my game files to try and find the crew traits. I've checked everything in the steam folder but I can't find it. can someone please point me in the direction I need?
It would be in the persistance file of your save your working in in your ksp saves folder in the ksp directory in the steam common folder.
You can edit your crew's traits in game with the Crew Manifest mod, which has been recently updated for .21.
ok thanks for the info guys, however I do not want to use mods, as i'm just looking at the traits as a 'educational exercise'.
